verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Premamrutha dhaarala chindina mana yesuku Samamevaru premaye thaanai nilachi Premokhtulane palki prematho praanamubetti Prema nagarikichaniye{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nischalamaina premajeeveeki ilalo thaavedi Prema drohule gaani priyamuna jeraru Vaani cherina chelikaadaguraa Samayamide parugidiraa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Entha ghora paapaathmula naina Preminchunu raa raa paapabharamutho Raa raa paadamulapai badaraa paapula Rakshakudesu thappaka ninu rakshinchu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Intha goppa rakshananu nirlakshyamu Chesedavela rakshana dina midiyeraa Thakshaname kanugonaraa idiye devuni Varamu mudamaaraga chekonumu{/lang-eng}
